message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that I believe would be of great value to you. Considering its worth to us and its potential benefits to you, I propose a price of $110 for it. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. After considering its worth, I am willing to pay up to $105 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. In order to move forward, I propose a price of $108 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our interests.
I've reviewed your latest proposal, Alice. While I understand the value in your product, I am unable to agree to a price higher than $105. I hope you can consider this amount as a final offer.
